summary: This is an email chain from August 13, 2019, regarding the Epstein death investigation. It involves communication with an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York, expressing thanks and indicating work on the investigation.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the final email in the chain, identified as an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York, who is thanked for their work on the Epstein death investigation.

events.title: Email Correspondence on Epstein Death Investigation
events.description: Email chain discussing the ongoing investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death, with thanks expressed to an Assistant United States Attorney.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 13, 2019, concerning the Jeffrey Epstein death investigation.
An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is involved in the correspondence.
The tone is cooperative, with expressions of thanks for assistance on the investigation.
